title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1210.2 - Atomic weapons of war and forbidden explosives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1210.2 - Atomic weapons of war and forbidden explosives

State Regulations

No vehicle shall enter upon either the George Washington

Bridge Upper Level, the Bayonne Bridge, the Goethals Bridge or the Outerbridge

Crossing if its load includes any weapon of war employing atomic fission or
radioactive force, or any component part of such weapon containing a
fissionable material, or any forbidden explosives as defined by D.O.T. regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1210.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
